DOC.detailed_description: ProSeal laryngeal mask airway easy insert due large cuff especially Asian population . First-time insertion success rate low time require achieve effective airway even well-trained physician . A number technique describe improve insertion success rate . However , technique recommend use backup digital introducer tool technique fail . We hypothesize insertion ProSeal laryngeal mask airway 90-degree rotation would reduce contact surface device pharyngeal wall make easy advance device smooth angle posterior pharyngeal wall.We compare success rate incidence complication standard technique rotational technique .
